channel.title: CVE Feed for Acronis -- Acronis Backup plugin for cPanel & WHM
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Acronis -- Acronis Backup plugin for cPanel & WHM

item.title: CVE-2024-8767|2024-09-17T13:43:37.687Z -- acronis -- acronis%20backup%20plugin%20for%20cpanel%20%26%20whm
item.description: Sensitive data disclosure and manipulation due to unnecessary privileges assignment. The following products are affected: Acronis Backup plugin for cPanel & WHM (Linux) before build 619, Acronis Backup extension for Plesk (Linux) before build 555, Acronis Backup plugin for DirectAdmin (Linux) before build 147.

item.title: CVE-2024-8767|2024-09-17T08:51:28.954Z -- acronis -- acronis%20backup%20plugin%20for%20cpanel%20%26%20whm
item.description: Sensitive data disclosure and manipulation due to unnecessary privileges assignment. The following products are affected: Acronis Backup plugin for cPanel & WHM (Linux) before build 619, Acronis Backup extension for Plesk (Linux) before build 555, Acronis Backup plugin for DirectAdmin (Linux) before build 147.
